projects.title: meinung
projects.subtitle: Research Project â€“ TUM: Junge Akademie
projects.description: An NLP-based tool to analyse and categorise moral perspectives in textual content, helping understand diverse viewpoints on societal topics in media. - Moral values are individually diverse and are expressed in a varied and massive way in news and media. Our goal is the development of a tool for analyzing and categorizing moral viewpoints on societal issues expressed in text form. To achieve this, a language analysis using machine-based learning will lead to a universally applicable framework.
